name: Nancy Drew: The White Wolf of Icicle Creek
overview: Is there a plot to sabotage the Icicle Creek Lodge? As Nancy Drew, go undercover and track down the culprit! Unexplained explosions and a white wolf haunt the bewildered guests of the Icicle Creek Lodge. Is there a plot to sabotage this wilderness resort? It’s up to you, as Nancy Drew, to go undercover as a hired employee and track down the culprit!
